name: Tribe of Noise
goal:
Tribe of Noise is a global music company connecting musicians and business. We develop and exploit "all rights included" music services for commercial use and share our revenue with the participating Tribe members: DIY musicians from around the world owning 100% of their (copy) rights and entitled to represent themselves.

Feb 2017: 29,000 members from 190+ countries.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Directive 2014/26/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 on collective management of copyright and related rights and multi-territorial licensing of rights in musical works for online use in the internal market Text with EEA relevance.
